articles.summary: However, there are very few complaints—only 53 out of over 5 million complaints total—as the CFPB has taken action against companies that misrepresented high-yield savings accounts. Most high-yield savings accounts don’t offer ATM cards, so incoming and outgoing money transfers happen via electronic transfer or mobile check deposit.
